abstract: A CBS report said Republican senators had been warned to “vote against the president and your head will be on a pike.”
lead_paragraph: Republican senators had mostly been listening stone-faced to Representative Adam B. Schiff, Democrat of California and the lead House manager, make his closing arguments. But when Mr. Schiff referred to a CBS report that said Republican senators had been warned to “vote against the president and your head will be on a pike,” a number of senators muttered “not true.”
